title: Crick Crack, Monkey - example of the "wrongside"

content.prompt: Which of the following would the narrator most likely identify as an example of the “wrongside” (second sentence of the final paragraph) ?

choices.label: Having “read the two books by Monday morning” (paragraph 1)

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
